sentences.en: Frank Mariano negotiates the desert terrain in his battered pickup.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克·马里亚诺驾驶他那辆破烂不堪的皮卡车成功穿越了沙漠地带。

sentences.en: He had made a detailed study of the terrain.
sentences.cn: 他对地形作了缜密的研究.

sentences.en: He knows the terrain of this locality like the back of his hand.
sentences.cn: 他对这一带的地形了如指掌.

sentences.en: How did you expect us to proceed on such a perilous expedition, through unknown terrain.
sentences.cn: 你怎么能指望我们如此冒险地穿越未知的地域，继续这一探险？

sentences.en: It had only opened the way of an unknown terrain.
sentences.cn: 这仅仅是开辟了通向茫茫荒原的一条道路.

sentences.en: It was obvious that David knew the terrain very well.
sentences.cn: 很明显,大卫对这里的地形十分熟悉.

sentences.en: It's a difficult terrain for tanks.
sentences.cn: 这是坦克作战的困难地形.

sentences.en: The aeroradiometric method suffers like others, in particular conditions of terrain.
sentences.cn: 航空放射性方法与其它方法一样, 受地形特殊条件的影响.

sentences.en: The enemy would always have the advantage of familiarity with the rugged terrain.
sentences.cn: 敌人一直都占有熟悉丘陵地形的优势。

sentences.en: The terrain changed quickly from arable land to desert.
sentences.cn: 那个地带很快就从耕地变成了沙漠。

sentences.en: The terrain is strategically situated and difficult of access.
The terrain's high points provide a panoramic view of Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 在这个地区的制高点能够看到洛杉矶的全景。

sentences.en: The time isn't as important as the terrain ; but the terrain isn't as important as unity with the people.
sentences.cn: 天时不如地利, 地利不如人和.

sentences.en: Valley glaciers are confined to valleys in mountainous terrain.
sentences.cn: 山谷冰川只限于多山地带的山谷.

words.tran_cn: 地形，地势；领域；[地理]地带

phrases.tran_cn: 不平地形，地形条件恶劣地区

trans.tran_cn: 地形，地势，地面，地带，[地理]岩层，（知识的）领域范围
